introduce: Deep convolutional Cascade for Face Alignment ( DeCaFA )

introduce.from sentence: In this paper , we introduce a Deep convolutional Cascade for Face Alignment ( DeCaFA ) .

several stages.from sentence: DeCaFA is composed of several stages that each produce landmark - wise attention maps , relatively to heterogeneous annotation markups .

attention maps.from sentence: It illustrates how these attention maps are refined through the successive stages , and how the different prediction tasks can benefit from each other .
